title: Bibliographic reference concept (OpenEBench Benchmarking Data Model schemas)
$comment: allOf and placeholders inspired by https://stackoverflow.com/a/24365393

_schema.title: The JSON schema absolute URI. It must match the value of 'id' in the JSON schema

dependable_community_ids.title: Dependable community ids
dependable_community_ids.description: The communities which could depend on this manuscript's knowledge. This list is only informative, because the list can only be managed by administrators

title.title: The title of the referenced material

bibliographic_ids.title: The recorded bibliographic ids of the referenced material, as CURIE/identifiers.org format or a bare link

items.title: Currently, the accepted ids are pmid, doi and pmc

abstract.title: Optionally, the abstract of the referenced material

authors.title: Optional list of authors of the referenced material

publishName.title: Name of the author as it appears at the publication

orcid.title: If an orcid exists for this author in the publication, the orcid itself
